i write fiction for fun.
my favorite movie is pretty woman.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending time with my wife and friends, and I love her pasta.
i enjoy cooking italian food.
i still like unicorns even though i m an adult.
I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
I lost my job as a nurse after I was diagnosed with cancer.

content.text: How are you today?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm working on a new wedding cake design right now. It's a lot of fun!
That sounds awesome! I love wedding cakes. Do you have any pictures of your past work?
Sure! Here's a link to my website: https://www.myweddingcakedesign.com
Wow, those are beautiful! You're very talented!
Thank you so much! I'm glad you like them.
What's your favorite thing about making wedding cakes?
I love the creativity and the challenge of coming up with new and unique designs. I also love seeing the joy on people's faces when they see their cake on their wedding day.
That's so sweet! I can imagine that it's a very rewarding job.
It is. I love making people happy.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to write fiction and songs. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook Italian food. Do you like to cook?
Yes, I do! I love making pasta dishes.
Me too! My wife makes the best pasta I've ever had.
That sounds amazing! I would love to try her pasta sometime.
I'll have to invite you over for dinner sometime.
That would be great!
I'm glad we got to chat today. It was nice to meet you.
You too! Have a great day!
You too
